title: GE Is Splitting Into Three Companies: What to Know About General Electric Breaking Up
sub_head: One of the best-known U.S. public companies is taking a dramatic step in an effort to restore growth
body:
General Electric Co. shares rose 5% Tuesday morning after the Boston company said it would split into three companies focusing on aviation, healthcare and energy. Hereâ€™s what to know about the decision.
GE is going to split into three companies over a period of years, in an effort to focus more sharply on areas where company sees growth opportunities. GE itself will become an aviation company, focused on making jet engines, and spin off its healthcare and energy businesses.
